sense.name: come into existence; begin
sense.examples: All one need know about this article is that it originated with the Weekly World News. Where did the game of chess originate? The river originates in Minnesota and eventually joins the Mississippi. My flight originates in Cleveland.

sense.name: cause to come into existence; create
sense.examples: She originated and spearheaded a successful campaign. MRP Capital announced that it originated a 2m dollar loan for the acquisition of Crystal River Restaurant. She originated the part of Callie in the world premiere of Tracey.
